scenes.description: Biboo and Kanata performing 'Cirno's Perfect Math Class'.
Dialogue scene after the first dance. Biboo receives a coin.
Biboo drops into a red digital arena and encounters the bosses.

subtitles.original: うざー！
subtitles.english: So annoying!

subtitles.original: 因幡ウサギ 可愛いげもないのに 新参の分際で
subtitles.english: That Inaba rabbit isn't even cute, yet for a newcomer...

subtitles.original: 再生百万回
subtitles.english: One million views?!

subtitles.original: もれなく愚民なんて
subtitles.english: Are all the commoners stupid?

subtitles.original: どういうことなのよ どちらかって言うなら
subtitles.english: What does this mean? If I had to say...

subtitles.original: 鯖管理もお疲れさんってとこにゃ？
subtitles.english: Good job on the server management, I guess?

subtitles.original: わかった！
subtitles.english: I get it!

subtitles.original: アタイがあまりにも天才だから 嫉妬してるんでしょ
subtitles.english: You're just jealous because I'm such a genius!

subtitles.original: ほんと、しょうがないわね
subtitles.english: Honestly, it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: せっかくだからアタイの天才の秘術を
subtitles.english: Since I'm here, I'll teach you my genius secret arts.

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけ教えてあげてもいいわよ！
subtitles.english: I guess I can teach you just a little bit!

subtitles.original: アタイとアタイとアタイとアタイと アタイとアタイとアタイと英知を
subtitles.english: Me and me and me and me and me and me and my wisdom...

subtitles.original: 集めて集めて集めて集めて
subtitles.english: Gather it, gather it, gather it, gather it!

subtitles.original: 束ねて束ねて束ねて束ねて 束ねても
subtitles.english: Bundle it, bundle it, bundle it... even if you bundle it!

subtitles.original: アタイのアタイのアタイのアタイの アタイのアタイのアタイは丈夫ね
subtitles.english: My, my, my, my, my, my, my... I'm sturdy, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 頭に頭に頭に頭に
subtitles.english: To the head, to the head, to the head...

subtitles.original: 適わない適わない適わない適わない 適わない
subtitles.english: No match, no match, no match, no match!

subtitles.original: 朝飯朝飯朝飯朝飯 朝飯朝飯食べたら
subtitles.english: Breakfast, breakfast... once I eat breakfast...

subtitles.original: 赤子の赤子の赤子の赤子の
subtitles.english: A baby's, a baby's, a baby's...

subtitles.original: 手を捻る 手を捻る 手を捻る 手を捻る
subtitles.english: Twist the hand, twist the hand...

subtitles.original: アタイはアタイはアタイはアタイは
subtitles.english: I am, I am, I am, I am...

subtitles.original: 完ぺき いわゆる
subtitles.english: Perfect! So-called...

subtitles.original: パーフェクト！
subtitles.english: Perfect!

subtitles.original: ひゃっくちょうまん ばっちり！
subtitles.english: One hundred trillion percent spot on!

subtitles.original: 山落ち 意味など無いわ
subtitles.english: There's no meaning to the punchline.

subtitles.original: キャラクター 立てばいいのよ
subtitles.english: As long as the character stands out!

subtitles.original: 元気があればなんでも
subtitles.english: If you have energy, you can do anything!

subtitles.original: くるくる 時計の針
subtitles.english: Round and round, the clock hands go.

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる 頭まわる
subtitles.english: Spinning round, my head is spinning.

subtitles.original: だってつぶら目玉 二つしかないのに
subtitles.english: I mean, I only have two round eyeballs...

subtitles.original: 三本の針なんて ちんぷんかん
subtitles.english: So three hands make no sense at all!

subtitles.original: 次々 問題出る
subtitles.english: Problem after problem appears.

subtitles.original: まだまだ 授業続く
subtitles.english: The class still goes on and on.

subtitles.original: 凍る部屋の中 冷やした温度も 時間も気にせず
subtitles.english: In this freezing room, ignoring the temperature and time...

subtitles.original: ゆっくりしていってね！
subtitles.english: Take it easy!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: もうバカでいいわよ！ 知らない！
subtitles.english: Fine, I'll just be an idiot! I don't care!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ バーカバーカ
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: てれん てれん てれん てれん
subtitles.english: Teren teren teren teren...

subtitles.original: 初めのダンジョンにしては手強かったなんて... なかなかやるな。
subtitles.english: For the first dungeon, that was tough... Not bad.

subtitles.original: よし、コインをやろう。
subtitles.english: Alright, I'll give you a coin.

subtitles.original: Yay! I got a coin!
subtitles.english: Yay! I got a coin!

subtitles.original: だー... 外れ？
subtitles.english: Duh... A miss?

subtitles.original: Thank you for dancing with me!
subtitles.english: Thank you for dancing with me!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was so much fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: It was fun. Thank you.

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Ja, I must go. Woah, okay.
subtitles.english: Ja, I must go. Woah, okay.

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: うう... ああ...
subtitles.english: Ugh... Ah...

subtitles.original: Oh, over here already? Okay.
subtitles.english: Oh, over here already? Okay.

subtitles.original: Ah, I see.
subtitles.english: Ah, I see.

subtitles.original: Well, what's next then? The rest is...
subtitles.english: Well, what's next then? The rest is...

subtitles.original: I count... one, two... two challenges left, I think,
subtitles.english: I count... one, two... two challenges left, I think,

subtitles.original: for two coins.
subtitles.english: for two coins.

subtitles.original: 待っていたぞ。
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for you.

subtitles.original: Bibibuu!
subtitles.english: Bibibuu!

subtitles.original: え？ かなた先輩？ ラプラス？
subtitles.english: Eh? Kanata-senpai? Laplus?

subtitles.original: What are you doing here?
subtitles.english: What are you doing here?

subtitles.original: これが欲しければ...
subtitles.english: If you want this...

subtitles.original: 我々と勝負だ！
subtitles.english: Then duel us!

subtitles.original: My coin!
subtitles.english: My coin!

subtitles.original: 勝負だ！
subtitles.english: It's a duel!

subtitles.original: 迫りくるゾンビを... 全部... 倒すことが...
subtitles.english: Can you... defeat... all... the approaching zombies...

subtitles.original: できるかな！？
subtitles.english: I wonder!?

subtitles.original: Oh... Well...
subtitles.english: Oh... Well...

subtitles.original: じゃあ、容赦は... しない！
subtitles.english: Then, I won't... show mercy!

subtitles.original: Run away, run away, run away you
subtitles.english: Run away, run away, run away you

subtitles.original: Gonna put the pedal down
subtitles.english: Gonna put the pedal down

subtitles.original: Nowhere to go, nowhere to go, nowhere to go
subtitles.english: Nowhere to go, nowhere to go, nowhere to go

subtitles.original: No road is left to run
subtitles.english: No road is left to run

subtitles.original: I was born, I was born with horns
subtitles.english: I was born, I was born with horns

subtitles.original: Demons couldn't shake me up
subtitles.english: Demons couldn't shake me up

subtitles.original: Bring it on, bring it on, bring it on
subtitles.english: Bring it on, bring it on, bring it on

subtitles.original: 'Cause we haven't had enough
subtitles.english: 'Cause we haven't had enough

subtitles.original: Don't give up the fight
subtitles.english: Don't give up the fight

subtitles.original: Make it out alive
subtitles.english: Make it out alive

subtitles.original: Sip this bottle, wine or blood
subtitles.english: Sip this bottle, wine or blood

subtitles.original: Don't give up, it's gonna be alright
subtitles.english: Don't give up, it's gonna be alright

subtitles.original: 'Cause I won't let you go
subtitles.english: 'Cause I won't let you go

subtitles.original: We're gonna make it out alive
subtitles.english: We're gonna make it out alive
